title: CB raises required reserve ratio - money supply...

content.question: If the central bank raises the required reserve ratio in a banking system with limited reserves, the money multiplier and the money supply will change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Money Multiplier Money Supply Increase Increase
Money Multiplier Money Supply Increase Decrease
Money Multiplier Money Supply Increase No change
Money Multiplier Money Supply Decrease No change
Money Multiplier Money Supply Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Money Multiplier Money Supply Decrease Decrease

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
